query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZCST402 ( MANDT, CS402_UPN, CS402_CST, CS402_PJT, CS402_HNO, CS402_SEQ, CS402_GND, CS402_PYM, CS402_ISR, CS402_HIS, CS402_GNO, CS402_YYM, CS402_GYM, CS402_YDT, CS402_AMT, CS402_HMT, CS402_DMT, CS402_ACMT, -- 공기청정기 추가 20200515 Han.JH CS402_VAT, CS402_TOT, CS402_BAM, CS402_RMK, CS402_PST, CS402_USE, CS402_MID, CS402_MDT, CS402_MTM, CS402_DOC, CS402_GBN, CS402_REQC, CS402_REQ, CS402_YYMA, CS402_YDTA, CS402_BAMA, CS402_AMTA, CS402_HMTA, CS402_DMTA, CS402_ACMTA -- 공기청정기 추가 20200515 Han.JH ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT#, #UPN#, #CST#, #PJT#, #HNO#, #SEQ#, #GND#, #MYM#, #ISR#, #ds_key.HIS#, #GNO#, #YYM_A#, #YYM_A#, #YDT_A#, #AMT_A#, #HMT_A#, #DMT_A#, #ACMT_A#, #VAT#, #TOT#, #BAM_A#, #RMK#, 'A1', 'Y', #G_USER_ID#, HEX(CURRENT DATE), HEX(CURRENT TIME), #DOCNO#, #GBN#, #REQC#, #REQ#, #YYM#, #YDT#, #BAM#, #AMT#, #HMT#, #DMT#, #ACMT# )
